Copyright plugin for VuePress.

## Usage

```bash
# pnpm
pnpm add -D vuepress-plugin-copyright2
# npm
npm i -D vuepress-plugin-copyright2
# yarn
yarn add -D vuepress-plugin-copyright2
```

---

VuePress 的复制版权插件。

## 使用

```bash
# pnpm
pnpm add -D vuepress-plugin-copyright2
# npm
npm i -D vuepress-plugin-copyright2
# yarn
yarn add -D vuepress-plugin-copyright2
```
